new LSTM - based architecture.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a new LSTM - based architecture for learning natural language inference .

to perform.from sentence: Instead , we use an LSTM to perform word - by - word matching of the hypothesis with the premise .

Our LSTM.from sentence: Our LSTM sequentially processes the hypothesis , and at each position , it tries to match the current word in the hypothesis with an attention - weighted representation of the premise .

refer to.from sentence: We refer to this architecture a match - LSTM , or m LSTM for short .
